title: No notification sound with texts. In settings - notifications - there is no "sound" category
content: I am trying to get sound notification for texts on pixel 3a. I have tried going into settings and into the app but do not see a choice anywhere to pick sound for a text. I have followed all the step-by-step instructions I have found on line to fix this, but have to stop when they say to touch "sound" because I do not have that as an option.
